name: Mashed Cheesy Potatoes
story: 2 lbs potatoes (add salt to your water while you boil the potatoes
ingredients: 6 medium potatoes, baked and grated ¾ lb. grated cheese
1-­‐2 cans Cream of Chicken Soup Corn Flakes
steps: ½ bunch green onions, chopped 16 oz. sour cream
Combine potatoes and all other ingredients except for Corn Flakes. Put in a 9x13 casserole dish and smooth
out until flat. Top with crushed Corn Flakes. Bake at 350° for 30 minutes, or until golden and bubbly.
